Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-47191 affecting package oath-toolkit for versions less than 2.6.9-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-47191 affecting package oath-toolkit for versions less than 2.6.9-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package oath-toolkit is earlier than 2.6.9-2, affected by CVE-2024-47191
